name: Fractal
description: Fractal brings first-person real-time combat to beautiful stylized VR vistas. Enter a dazzling dimension where color is the lifeblood of all beings. Wielding a mysterious brush, you are granted the power to reshape the world and fate of its denizens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 300 MB available space
